long_description: pratra travel technologies is an iso 9001:2008 certified one-of-a-kind travel technology company that strives hard to craft and modernize travel management solutions in the fast-paced travel industry. having spent the better part of our professional lives in this domain, we excel at bridging the management gaps in the world of travel. from addressing the needs of top travel corporations to medium-sized travel agencies, our products and services cover a lot of grey areas that favor all and sundry.our growth record has been in line with the rich clientele we enjoy. expanding our wings further, we are all set to conquer new frontiers.
